  • java.lang.Object

  • public class WauzPlayerEnemyBossBar
extends WauzPlayerBossBar
    An UI class to show the player name and health of the targeted enemy.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Constructor Detail

      • WauzPlayerEnemyBossBar

        public WauzPlayerEnemyBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                              java.util.List<MenacingModifier> modifiers,
                              double maxHealth,
                              boolean raidBoss)
        Creates a boss bar for the given entity. Also schedules a task to check if the entity and assigned players are still valid.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity, this bar belongs to.
        modifiers - Menacing modifiers shown in the bar.
        maxHealth - Max health shown in the bar.
        raidBoss - If the entity is a raid boss.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerBossBar.doPlayerChecks()

    • Method Detail

      • getBossBar

        public static WauzPlayerBossBar getBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Parameters:
        entity - An entity with a boss bar.
        Returns:
        The boss bar of this entity, if existing.

      • doPlayerChecks

        protected void doPlayerChecks()
        Schedules a task to check if the object and assigned players are still valid. If not, they get removed, else the task is scheduled again for the next second.
        Specified by:
        doPlayerChecks in class WauzPlayerBossBar
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerBossBar.destroy()

      • getName

        protected java.lang.String getName()

        Specified by:
